channel.title: Music Thread
channel.description:
Hi, I Was/Am Bored So I Thought Of Making A Music Thread. ( If You Want To Post Use The Layout Shown )
Type Of Music : Rock/Pop/Hip Hop ( Sucks )/Rap/Jazz/Classical Why You Like It : Cause It Rocks ( Example ) Image Of The Band/Artists
I Was Just Curious So I Made A Topic All About Music :P.. For Me : I Like Rap/Rock.. Like... Sonata Arctica And Eminem, 50 Cent... And Thanks For Posting In My Thread. - Eclipse940 PS. ( I Might Make More Fill Out Points )

[/quote] please spell right, or else most people cant understand what the heck your saying :)[/quote]
Good attitude.

[quote=“Eclipse940, post:1, topic:134459”]Hi, I Was/Am Bored So I Thought Of Making A Music Thread. ( If You Want To Post Use The Layout Shown )

[quote]Type Of Music : Rock/Pop/Hip Hop ( Sucks )/Rap/Jazz/Classical

Why You Like It : Cause It Rocks ( Example )

Image Of The Band/Artists[/quote]
I Was Just Curious So I Made A Topic All About Music :P…
For Me : I Like Rap/Rock… Like… Sonata Arctica And Eminem, 50 Cent…
And Thanks For Posting In My Thread.

  • Eclipse940
    PS. ( I Might Make More Fill Out Points )[/quote]
    Just a note, can you please not make each new word a capital? Kind of annoying.

What i like: Pop/Rock/Jazz.
Why:
-Pop: Very catchy and i listen to the radio any chance i can.
-Rock: Can also be very catchy and good music to “bob” to, aha.
-Jazz: I just like the style. Sort of Sticato-ish. Then there’s smooth and lay back and normally drags on with vibrato. (Saxophone)
